title: Social Web-Based Mathematical Learning Object Design and Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of fundamental math concepts and basic digital device usage skills
context.additional_context: A course developing learning object (LO)-based e-learning activities for managers over 40 to effectively design and operate elementary math education content in a social web environment.

learning_goals: Cultivate the ability to design digital content aligned with mathematics education objectives by analyzing learning object (LO) components.
Developing the ability to design collective intelligence-based problem-solving activities using social web tools (sharing/collaboration platforms)
Establishing blended (hybrid) instructional strategies to promote learner interaction in BYOD environments
Cultivating the ability to measure mathematical concept understanding and provide feedback using learning object-based assessment tools

resources: Digital Tools for Mathematics Education (e.g., GeoGebra, Desmos)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
